etymology.description: 中山 (Zhongshan; Sun Yat-sen) + 区 (district) = district named Zhongshan.
etymology.interpretation: Administrative district in Taipei named in honor of Sun Yat-sen (Sun Zhongshan). Refers specifically to the Zhongshan District of Taipei City.
etymology.simplification: 區 was simplified to 区 in the PRC to reduce strokes; 中 and 山 were unchanged. In Taiwan the official form remains 中山區.

examples.chinese: 台北的中山区很繁华(臺北的中山區很繁華)。
examples.pinyin: Táiběi de Zhōngshān Qū hěn fánhuá.
examples.english: Zhongshan District in Taipei is very bustling.

examples.chinese: 这个地名是为了纪念孙中山而命名(這個地名是為了紀念孫中山而命名)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège dìmíng shì wèile jìniàn Sūn Zhōngshān ér mìngmíng.
examples.english: The place name was given to commemorate Sun Yat-sen.

examples.chinese: 它位于台北市中心(它位於臺北市中心)，交通便利(交通便利)。
examples.pinyin: Tā wèiyú Táiběi Shì zhōngxīn, jiāotōng biànlì.
examples.english: It is located in central Taipei, with convenient transportation.
